Text: Thank yoU MP4sux, thank yoU AVIGUY and thank yoU PirateBay. Love these little files.

Indeed : thank you for the AVIs...I cant watch anything on the computer...my ADD kicks in and I get distracted... 

So I got to watch things on my DVD player-and the only format my DVD player reads is AVI...so...

Thank you for the AVIs!
